com.redhat.rhn.taskomatic.task.threaded
Interface QueueDriver

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChannelRepodataDriver, ErrataCacheDriver, ErrataQueueDriver
public interface QueueDriver

"Driver" for a work queue of worker threads

Method Summary

          Logic to tell the queue when to stop running Queues will always stop when there is no more work to do.

Create a worker instance to work on a particular work item

Parameters:

Returns:
worker instance

canContinue

boolean canContinue()
Logic to tell the queue when to stop running Queues will always stop when there is no more work to do. This method can return false to cause the queue to stop early.

Returns:
true if processing can continue, otherwise false

initialize

void initialize()
Actions that has to be executed, when queue is created
